name: Build A Snowman (mmgames33)
description:
Building a snowman can be a cold affair! Fortunately this game allows you the challenge and excitement of building a beaut without leaving your favorite chair.
The game play is simple to learn but tricky to master:  There are a total of 5 rounds, each timed.  When the floating pieces pass by their place on the snowman, press the correct key to lock them into place.

The keys are largely self explanatory (space to begin, n = nose, s= scarf etc.) but not to worry, the specifics are printed in the background of each stage.

Good luck and stay warm!
